info.title: Wave API
info.description: Documentation of API endpoints of Wave

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description:
* `translate` - translate
* `transcribe` - transcribe

get.description:
OpenApi3 schema for this API. Format can be selected via content negotiation.

- YAML: application/vnd.oai.openapi
- JSON: application/vnd.oai.openapi+json
- List all payments made by the user

subscription_status.description:
If the payment is for a custom plan, then check by duration alloted
else check by number of videos subtitled

If the payment is for a custom plan, then check by duration alloted
else check by number of videos subtitled

PriviledgeEnum.description:
* `CAN_DOWNLOAD` - User can download video to watch offline
* `CAN_CREATE_SUBTILES` - User can add subtitles to video
